Aaron Rodgers leads dramatic game-winning drive in 4th qtr to give Green Bay a 27-24 win over Miami. Packers are 4-2.
Broncos come away with 31-17 win vs Jets.‚Ä¢ Peyton Manning: 237 Pass yds, 3 TD‚Ä¢ Demaryius Thomas: 124 Rec yds, TD‚Ä¢ Julius Thomas: 2 Rec TD
PACKERS TOUCHDOWN!!!!Aaron Rodgers find Andrew Quarless with :03 to give Green Bay the lead. Rodgers stellar on drive.
Geno Smith throws Pick-6. Aqib Talib returns Smith interception for TD, and Broncos take 31-17 lead over Jets.
Aaron Rodgers just did a fake spike in Miami. Dan Marino would be proud.
Tom Brady is BACK. He finds Brandon LaFell for 56-yard TD and Patriots lead, 37-22.Brady: 352 Pass yds, 1st 300-yard game of season
Browns blow out Steelers, 31-10. Ben Roethlisberger falls to 18-2 all-time vs Cleveland.Ben Tate: 78 Rush yds, 2 TD
Tennessee hangs on! Titans block the Jaguars game-winning FG attempt in closing seconds to win, 16-14. Jags fall to 0-6.
Lions defense dominates Vikings in 17-3 win. Detroit intercepts Teddy Bridgewater 3 times, sacks him 8 times.
Ravens cruise past Bucs, 48-17. Flacco: first Ravens QB with 300 Pass Yds, 5 TD and 0 Int in a single game.
Touchdown Bills! Kyle Orton connects with Chris Hogan for TD, picks up 2-point conversion to make it one-possession game vs Patriots, 30-22.
Bengals answer! A 97-yd Adam Jones kickoff return sets up a Jeremy Hill 3-yd touchdown run. Cincinnati & Carolina all tied up at 31.
Touchdown Panthers! Carolina takes 31-24 lead with under 5 minutes left in the 4th. Cam Newton: 219 Pass yds, 2 TD, Rush TD
Jets making things interesting vs Broncos. Geno Smith finds Eric Decker for short TD pass. New York trails Denver, 24-17.
On the 25th anniversary of one of the biggest trades in NFL history, @30for30 chronicles the Herschel Walker trade.¬ª
More on the status of reigning MVP Kevin Durant. ¬ª
In last 5 seasons, Kevin Durant has missed just 6 games.He's led NBA in games, minutes & points during that time.
WR Calvin Johnson & RB Reggie Bush are both inactive for Lions today vs Vikings.
UPDATE: No timetable set for treatment of Kevin Durant's foot, other players who had surgical procedure for this injury missed 6-8 weeks.
THIS JUST IN: Thunder F Kevin Durant is expected to miss 6-8 weeks with a right foot injury.
LeBron made this #SCNotTop10 play by setting a screen for his old teammate Norris Cole. VIDEO:
Read of the Week: After the World Cup, what life holds for Abby Wambach is unknown. (@espnW)
ICYMI: @KirkHerbstreit's top 4 after Week 7:1a. Mississippi State1b. Ole Miss3. FSU4. Baylor
ICYMI: This 1-handed Travin Dural TD helped LSU beat Florida, 30-27 as Les Miles gets his 100th win. VIDEO:
ICYMI: Wild game in Tucson last night. USC hangs on to beat No. 10 Arizona, 28-26 in a thriller.VIDEO:
One thing is for sure... the new AP Top 10 is going to look very different.
HE MISSED IT! Casey Skowron misses go-ahead field goal as USC holds on to beat No. 10 Arizona, 28-26. What a finish in Tucson.
The Cats aren't dead yet! No. 10 Arizona recovers the onside kick and trails USC by 2 points. Watch finish on ESPN2. #USCvsAZ
USC holds! Jared Baker's 3rd touchdown of game gets Arizona within 2 points, but Wildcats fail to convert. USC leads No. 10 Arizona, 28-26.
Wildcats are in the red zone. Catch the finish on ESPN2 as No. 10 Arizona looks to tie USC late in 4th quarter. #USCvsAZ
It's not over yet in Tucson. Anu Solomon connects with Jared Baker on 4th and 3 for a 41 yard touchdown. No. 10 Arizona trails USC, 28-20.
Trojans come right back and respond. Buck Allen's third touchdown of the game increases USC's lead over No. 10 Arizona, 28-13.
Wildcats are still alive. Off the fumble by USC, Jared Baker runs it in from 6 yards out and No. 10 Arizona trials, 21-13. Watch on ESPN2.
No. 3 Ole Miss goes into Kyle Field and dominates No. 14 Texas A&M, 35-20. - Bo Wallace: 2 rush TD - Rebels D: 2 TD
Help us pick 3 stars of the night. We pick 2 performances, YOU pick the 3rd. Use #SC3stars and your tweet could air in the midnight ET show!
Ole Miss' defense is UNREAL. Rebels have allowed as many TD on year as they've scored. Here's their 4th defensive TD:
Scoop and score! The Landsharks of Ole Miss score their 2nd defensive touchdown of the game. Rebels lead Aggies in 4th quarter, 35-7.
San Francisco takes Game 1 of NLCS! Madison Bumgarner's LIGHTS OUT performance leads Giants over Cardinals, 3-0.
Aggies are on the board! Trey Williams pounds it in from 3 yards out, No. 3 Ole Miss leads No. 14 Texas A&M in 3rd quarter, 21-7.
LSU wins it! Travin Dural makes UNREAL 1-handed #SCtop10 catch as Tigers beat Gators, 30-27. ¬ª
ICYMI: Baylor and TCU set record for most points scored between AP Top-10 teams. Relive the action in 190 seconds. ¬ª
No. 3 Ole Miss leads No. 14 Texas A&M at half, 21-0.For 1st time in Kevin Sumlin's head coaching career, he is being shut out at half.
Wolverines are back in the win column! Michigan ends 3 game losing streak, beats Penn State, 18-13.
PICK SIX! Cody Prewitt intercepts Kenny Hill and takes it 75 yards to the house. No. 3 Ole Miss dominating No. 14 Texas A&M, 21-0.
Touchdown Rebels! Bo Wallace's 2nd touchdown run of the game caps off 99-yard drive, No. 3 Ole Miss leads No. 14 Texas A&M, 14-0.
Tide survive! Landon Collins' late interception seals the deal as No. 7 Alabama avoids upset, beats Arkansas, 14-13.
Interception! Landon Collins comes up with the HUGE pick for the Tide. No. 7 Alabama leads Arkansas, 14-13, late in 4th quarter.
UPSET ALERT: Arkansas has the ball with under 3 minutes to play. No. 7 Alabama is up by 1. Catch the finish on ESPN.
Mississippi State's been climbing quickly.Preseason-Week 4: UnrankedWeek 5: 14Week 6: 12Week 7: 3Week 8: ?
Royals take Game 2! KC opens up a 2-0 lead in ALCS. Royals still haven't lost a playoff game since 1985.
UPSET ALERT: Arkansas takes a 13-7 lead over No. 7 Alabama in the 3rd quarter. Razorbacks looking for first SEC win under Bret Bielema.
TCU had allowed 54 points all SEASON before allowing 61 to Baylor today.
Mississippi State becomes 5th team in AP poll history to win 3 straight games against Top 10 teams.
Bears win! No. 5 Baylor overcomes 21-point, 4th-quarter deficit to beat No. 9 TCU, 61-58. Bryce Petty throws 510 pass yards, 6 TD in win.
LeBron just set a great screen for Norris Cole. One problem: Norris Cole still plays for the Heat. #SCNotTop10 VIDEO:
Tie game in Waco! Bryce Petty connects with Corey Coleman for the TD, ties TCU at 58. Petty now has 510 yards & 6 TD, both career highs.
Are you afraid of the Dak? Mississippi State Heisman hopeful Dak Prescott carries Bulldogs to 38-23 upset of Auburn.
INTERCEPTION! Nick Marshall throws a crucial pick in the red zone. Mississippi State leads, 38-23 with 2:44 to play and the ball.
Notre Dame improves to 6-0 on season, beats UNC, 50-43. Irish score 50 points in a game for 1st time since 2012.
UPSET ALERT: Kansas ties No. 16 Oklahoma State in the 4th quarter, 20-20. Jayhawks have won just 3 conference games since 2008.
Crisis averted! Darien Harris with the  pick six and No. 8 Michigan State takes a 45-31 lead over Purdue with 1:22 to play. #MSUvsPUR
Ducks win! No. 12 Oregon beats No. 18 UCLA in Pasadena, 42-30. Marcus Mariota: 210 Pass yds, 2 TD; 75 Rush yds, 2 TD.
Notre Dame retakes the lead! Everett Golson connects with Tarean Folston for the TD. No. 6 Irish are up on North Carolina in 4th Q, 43-36.
What a catch, Lorenzo Cain! Cain with a full extension #SCtop10 grab in center field. Orioles and Royals tied at 4, bottom 6th.
UPSET ALERT: Tar Heels take the lead! North Carolina is up on No. 6 Notre Dame late in 3rd quarter, 36-35.
Duke Williams with the #SCtop10 grab for the touchdown! Auburn drives 99 yards to cut the deficit to 28-20, 6 minutes left in 3rd quarter.
Mike Moustakas hit 15 HR in 140 regular season games this year.He's hit 4 in 6 postseason games. Royals lead, 4-3.
Wild game in Waco! No. 9 TCU leads No. 5 Baylor at half, 31-27. Horned Frogs add to lead with this 94-yard TD return.
Halftime! Mississippi State is making some noise. No. 3 Bulldogs lead No. 2 Auburn, 28-13. Dak Prescott: 182 Pass yds, TD; 82 Rush yds, 2 TD
2nd half is underway in Pasadena. No. 12 Oregon leads No. 18 UCLA, 21-10. Ducks haven't blown a double-digit halftime lead in last 12 years.
Goodbye! Adam Jones just DESTROYED that pitch from Yordano Ventura. First career postseason HR for Jones ties Game 2, 3-3.
94 yards to the house! B.J. Catalon takes the kickoff back for the score, answers Baylor and puts the Horned Frogs back out front, 31-24.
Auburn chipping away in Starkville! No. 2 Tigers have scored 13 unanswered points, trail No. 3 Mississippi State, 21-13, in first half.
TCU making a statement in Waco! Horned Frogs take a 21-10 lead on this 9-yard TD run by B.J. Catalon. VIDEO:
The rout is on in Pasadena! No. 12 Oregon takes a 21-3 lead over No. 18 UCLA with 3 minutes left in 1st half. #UOvsUCLA
World Cup champions go down! Poland beats Germany in Euro qualifiers, 2-0. First time Poland has EVER beat Germany in soccer.
Touchdown Irish. No. 6 Notre Dame scores 14 unanswered points, ties North Carolina at 14 in 2nd quarter.
Royals offense making a difference before extra innings today. Eric Hosmer singles home a pair, Royals take a 2-0 lead in the 1st inning.
Mississippi State doing WORK! No. 3 Bulldogs take an early 21-0 lead over No. 2 Auburn. Six minutes left in the first quarter.
Rough day for Everett Golson so far: 0-4, fumble, interception, and Irish fall behind at home to North Carolina, 14-0.
Touchdown Bulldogs! No. 3 Mississippi State pounds it in and leads No. 2 Auburn, 14-0, early in 1st quarter. #AUBvsMSST
